title.rendered: “Upcoming Home Front Command Siren Tests in Galilee: Key Details and Alerts”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Sirens tests by the Home Front Command will take place today in the Hokuk and Migdal areas in the Galilee. Another exercise will be conducted in the Mitzpe Ilan area of the Menashe Regional Council.

Home Front Command siren tests will occur today (Monday) at 10:05 in Hokuk, at 10:35 in Mitzpe Ilan, and at 12:05 in Migdal.

If a real alert is activated, a rising and falling alarm will sound again. Meanwhile, an alert will also be disseminated through the Home Front Command app and through complementary warning systems.

Additional information can be found at the Home Front Command call center at phone number 104, via WhatsApp messages to phone number 052-9104104, on the national portal at oref.org.il, and on social media.
